required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: Effects of a Pizza Meal Challenge on the Immunometabolism of Monocytes and T Cells

brief_summary.textblock: High salt intake is a major risk factor for cardiovascular events, including stroke, heart disease and kidney failure. Pizza is a popular salty food. In this exploratory pilot study, the effects of a pizza meal challenge on immunometabolism in healthy subjects will be tested.

primary_outcome.measure: Oxygen consumption rate of immune cells
primary_outcome.time_frame: 3 hours after the pizza compared to baseline
primary_outcome.description: OCR (pmol oxygen/min/1000 cells) measured by Seahorse

secondary_outcome.measure: Oxygen consumption rate of immune cells
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 3 and 8 hours after the pizza adjusted for plasma sodium concentration compared to baseline
secondary_outcome.description: OCR (pmol oxygen/min/1000 cells) measured by Seahorse

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 3 and 8 hours after the pizza compared to baseline

secondary_outcome.measure: Mitochondrial membrane potential of immune cells
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 3 and 8 hours after the pizza compared to baseline
secondary_outcome.description: Mitochondrial membrane potential (Mean Fluorescence Intensity of TMRE) measured by flow cytometry

secondary_outcome.measure: Extracellular acidification rate of immune cells
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 3 and 8 hours after the pizza compared to baseline

secondary_outcome.measure: Interleukin 17 release after monocyte and T cell co-culture
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Cell isolation at baseline and 3 hours after the pizza followed by 72 hours of co-culture

secondary_outcome.measure: Interferon-gamma release after monocyte and T cell co-culture
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Cell isolation at baseline and 3 hours after the pizza followed by 72 hours of co-culture

secondary_outcome.measure: Adenosine triphophate production of immune cells
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 3 and 8 hours after the pizza compared to baseline
secondary_outcome.description: Percent change of luminescence (%) measured by Luminescence Assay

arm_group.description: Vegetarian pizza containing 10 grams of salt

intervention.description: Vegetarian pizza containing 10 grams of salt

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy men and women
Exclusion Criteria:
- Severe, manifest illnesses in need of treatment
- Pathological lab results
- Inability to understand significance and scope of the study

patient_data.ipd_description: Individual participant data that underlie the results of reported articles (text, tables, figures, supplemental data) will be shared after deidentification.
patient_data.ipd_time_frame: Beginning 9 months and ending 36 months following article publication.
patient_data.ipd_access_criteria: Researchers who provide a methodologically sound proposal.
